title: Graduate/Doctoral Student Admission Requirements  · Angelo State University
description: Apply to Angelo State’s graduate programs and take the next step in your academic journey with streamlined admissions and financial aid options.

paragraphs: Take the next step with Angelo State.
Complete an application throughApplyTexas.
Pay the non-refundable application fee.
Domestic: $50International: $60

Applications submitted in Apply Texas prior to 6 p.m. will receive an email with a link to pay the application fee the next business day. Applications submitted in Apply Texas after 6 p.m. will receive an email with a link to pay the application fee within two business days. You can also pay your application fee through RamPort, our portal, upon receiving your login information.
Submit your transcript(s) from your undergraduate institution(s) and any supporting documents.
With the exception of the centralized application for Athletic Training (ATCAS), Nursing (NursingCAS), Physical Therapy (PTCAS), and Master/Doctoral Social Work (InPlace) programs.

Unofficial copies of transcripts and test scores are required for application evaluation purposes, unless you attended Angelo State for your undergraduate degree. If you’re admitted, you will be required to submit official transcripts and test scores.Please do not send official transcript(s) until you have received a notice of acceptance from Angelo State University. Unless an unofficial transcript is not on hand, please request one.All transcripts become the property of Angelo State University once submitted.
Please be aware that the overall GPA as posted to the transcript from the baccalaureate degree-awarding institution will be applied.
Submit Documents for Application
Verify additional admissions requirements.

In addition to transcripts and test scores, most of our graduate programs require supplemental materials for admission review. These materials may include, but are not limited to, a statement of purpose, letters of recommendation and/or writing samples.
To see if your program requires additional information, please view yourdegree program.
Your residency classification is initially based on the information provided on your ApplyTexas application.
Learn More About Texas Residency
In addition to meeting regular admission requirements for yourdegree program, there are additional application requirements before we can issue a Form I-20 Certificate for Eligibility.

All international applicants must provide proof of English proficiency before their application can be considered for admission. Only your most recent measure of English proficiency is considered for admission purposes. This test is waived only for graduates of U.S. universities or universities in English proficiency-exempt countries. If you believe you may be exempt, please complete thisform.
You may submit one of the following English proficiency measures:

You may provide proof of financial support as part of your application, or you may provide proof upon learning of your admission decision. The follow documents are necessary for application evaluation purposes:
We’re excited to welcome you to campus! Here are some resources for you before you begin your study abroad experience with us:
After you have applied to Angelo State, you will receive a username and password to log in to RamPort, our internal portal. Here you can:
Check Your Application Status

Complete an application throughApplyTexas.If you have been an existing Apply Texas user since 2021, you will need to create a new password to access the system the first time you log in. Please use the email address associated with your Apply Texas account and select “Forgot password?” to set a new password.If you have problems accessing the application, please contact the College of Graduate Studies and Research at 325-942-2169 orgraduate.studies@angelo.edu.

Pay the non-refundable application fee.Domestic: $50International: $60Applications submitted in Apply Texas prior to 6 p.m. will receive an email with a link to pay the application fee the next business day. Applications submitted in Apply Texas after 6 p.m. will receive an email with a link to pay the application fee within two business days. You can also pay your application fee through RamPort, our portal, upon receiving your login information.

Submit your transcript(s) from your undergraduate institution(s) and any supporting documents.With the exception of the centralized application for Athletic Training (ATCAS), Nursing (NursingCAS), Physical Therapy (PTCAS), and Master/Doctoral Social Work (InPlace) programs.Unofficial copies of transcripts and test scores are required for application evaluation purposes, unless you attended Angelo State for your undergraduate degree. If you’re admitted, you will be required to submit official transcripts and test scores.Please do not send official transcript(s) until you have received a notice of acceptance from Angelo State University. Unless an unofficial transcript is not on hand, please request one.All transcripts become the property of Angelo State University once submitted.Please be aware that the overall GPA as posted to the transcript from the baccalaureate degree-awarding institution will be applied.Submit Documents for Application

Verify additional admissions requirements.In addition to transcripts and test scores, most of our graduate programs require supplemental materials for admission review. These materials may include, but are not limited to, a statement of purpose, letters of recommendation and/or writing samples.To see if your program requires additional information, please view yourdegree program.
Mandatory, non-refundable $50 application fee (international money order payable in U.S. dollars).

Degrees earned at a foreign institution must be evaluated by an official foreign transcript evaluator. The preferred service isForeign Credential Services of America, but any company in the United States is acceptable. Evaluations must be completed in English and include semester credit hours and letter grades. The approximate cost is U.S. $175 for a full evaluation. All transcripts become the property of Angelo State University once submitted and cannot be returned to applicants.
An evaluation is not required if your degree was earned at a U.S. institution. You may submit an unofficial transcript via the Graduate Studies Document Submissionform.
Supplemental Information Formprovides additional information about your citizenship.

ASU Official Financial Statement- you and your sponsor must complete this form, guaranteeing your financial support while you are in the United States and submit it to the Center for International Studies atcis@angelo.edu.
Original Bank Statement or Letter with amounts in U.S. dollars with the original signature. Submit to the Center for International Studies atcis@angelo.edu.

View your class schedule, grades and account information
